verses.verse: When the <S%H4436>queen<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of the <S%H8088>fame<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> she <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5254>prove<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> with hard <S%H2420>questions<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>great<s%> <S%H2428>train,<s%> and <S%H1581>camels<s%> that <S%H5375>bore<s%> <S%H1314>spices,<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance,<s%> and <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stones:<s%> and when she had <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> she <S%H1696>talked<s%> with him of all that was in her <S%H3824>heart.<s%>
<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> her all her <S%H1697>questions;<s%> and there was not anything <S%H5956>hidden<s%> from <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> which he <S%H5046>didn't<s%> tell her.
When the <S%H4436>queen<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> had <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> that he had <S%H1129>built,<s%>

and the <S%H3978>food<s%> of his <S%H7979>table,<s%> and the <S%H4186>sitting<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and the <S%H4612>attendance<s%> of his <S%H8334>ministers,<s%> and their <S%H4403>clothing,<s%> his cup <S%H8248>bearers<s%> <S%H4403>also,<s%> and their clothing, and his <S%H5944>ascent<s%> by which he went <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> there was no more spirit in <S%H7307>her.<s%>

She <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> "It was a <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H1697>report<s%> that I <S%H8085>heard<s%> in my own <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H1697>acts,<s%> and of your <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>

However I <S%H539>didn't<s%> believe their <S%H1697>words,<s%> until I <S%H935>came,<s%> and my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> had <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2677>it;<s%> and behold, the half of the <S%H4768>greatness<s%> of your <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> was not <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H3254>me:<s%> you exceed the <S%H8052>fame<s%> that I <S%H8085>heard.<s%>

<S%H835>Happy<s%> are your <S%H582>men,<s%> and <S%H835>happy<s%> are these your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> who <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8085>you,<s%> and hear your <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>

<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> who <S%H2654>delighted<s%> in <S%H5414>you,<s%> to set you on his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> to be <S%H4428>king<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> because your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H160>loved<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H5975>establish<s%> them <S%H5769>forever,<s%> therefore <S%H5414>made<s%> he you <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H6213>them,<s%> to do <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>"

She <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H1314>spices<s%> in <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H7230>abundance,<s%> and <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stones:<s%> neither was there any such <S%H1314>spice<s%> as the <S%H4436>queen<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>

The <S%H5650>servants<s%> also of <S%H2361>Huram,<s%> and the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> who <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> from <S%H211>Ophir,<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H418>algum<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> and <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stones.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> of the <S%H418>algum<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H4546>terraces<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and for the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H3658>harps<s%> and stringed <S%H5035>instruments<s%> for the <S%H7891>singers:<s%> and there were none like <S%H1992>these<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

<S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H4436>queen<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> all her <S%H2656>desire,<s%> whatever she <S%H7592>asked,<s%> besides that which she had <S%H935>brought<s%> to the <S%H4428>king.<s%> So she <S%H2015>turned,<s%> and went <S%H3212>to<s%> her own <S%H776>land,<s%> she and her <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

Now the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> was <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8346>sixty<s%> - <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%>

besides that which the <S%H582>traders<s%> and <S%H5503>merchants<s%> <S%H935>brought:<s%> and all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6152>Arabia<s%> and the <S%H6346>governors<s%> of the <S%H776>country<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>

<S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6793>bucklers<s%> of <S%H7820>beaten<s%> <S%H2091>gold;<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H7820>beaten<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6793>buckler.<s%>

He made <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H4043>shields<s%> of <S%H7820>beaten<s%> <S%H2091>gold;<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4043>shield:<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> them in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>
Moreover the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H8127>ivory,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And there were <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H4609>steps<s%> to the <S%H3678>throne,<s%> with a <S%H3534>footstool<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> which were <S%H270>fastened<s%> to the <S%H3678>throne,<s%> and <S%H3027>stays<s%> on either side by the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H3427>seat,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H738>lions<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H3027>stays.<s%>

<S%H8147>Twelve<s%> <S%H738>lions<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> there on the one side and on the other on the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H4609>steps:<s%> there was nothing like it <S%H6213>made<s%> in any <S%H4467>kingdom.<s%>

All <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>'s <S%H4945>drinking<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> were of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> were of <S%H5462>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold:<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> was <S%H3972>nothing<s%> <S%H2803>accounted<s%> of in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>

For the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H591>ships<s%> that <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> with the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H2361>Huram;<s%> <S%H259>once<s%> every <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> the <S%H591>ships<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> <S%H5375>bringing<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H8143>ivory,<s%> and <S%H6971>apes,<s%> and <S%H8500>peacocks.<s%>
So <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1431>exceeded<s%> all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> in <S%H6239>riches<s%> and <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>

All the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> his <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> which <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H5414>put<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

They <S%H935>brought<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4503>tribute,<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H8008>clothing,<s%> <S%H5402>armor,<s%> and <S%H1314>spices,<s%> <S%H5483>horses,<s%> and <S%H6505>mules,<s%> a <S%H1697>rate<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> by <S%H8141>year.<s%>

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H723>stalls<s%> for <S%H5483>horses<s%> and <S%H4818>chariots,<s%> and <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> that he <S%H3240>stationed<s%> in the <S%H7393>chariot<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and with the <S%H4428>king<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
He <S%H4910>ruled<s%> over all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> from the <S%H5104>River<s%> even to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> to be in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> as <S%H68>stones,<s%> and he <S%H5414>made<s%> <S%H730>cedars<s%> to be as the sycamore <S%H8256>trees<s%> that are in the <S%H8219>lowland,<s%> for <S%H7230>abundance.<s%>
They <S%H3318>brought<s%> <S%H5483>horses<s%> for <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and out of all <S%H776>lands.<s%>

Now the <S%H7605>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%> and <S%H314>last,<s%> <S%H3789>aren't<s%> they written in the <S%H1697>history<s%> of <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> and in the <S%H5016>prophecy<s%> of <S%H281>Ahijah<s%> the <S%H7888>Shilonite,<s%> and in the <S%H2378>visions<s%> of <S%H3260>Iddo<s%> the <S%H2374>seer<s%> concerning <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat?<s%>
<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

<S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and he was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father:<s%> and <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>
